Job Description: Job Description Sr. Software Developer   6+ Years / 1 Opening / indore  Skills    Strong experience of C#, Entity Framework, Javascript, Web API, SQL   Roles And Responsibilities    Taking ownership of the work given, understand and ensure that is it done correctly within timeframe     Work with the other teams to ensure, the development is done correctly and is accessible to front end     Effective and proactive updates about the work done and problems faced     Ensure the work done is working correctly and as expected     Write unit test cases for the work done to verify the code written is working properly
